Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes broadband franchises in N.Y. city
Summary: Authorizes broadband franchises in cities with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง27, Transp Corps L; add ยง99-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation corporations law and the public service law, in relation to authorizing broadband franchises in cities with a population of one million or more
